headline: McDonald's (MCD): Exploring Valuation After a 6% Share Price Slide This Month
summary: McDonald's (MCD) shares dipped slightly in recent trading, continuing a month-long slide that has caught the attention of investors. The restaurant giant’s stock is now sitting about 6% lower than it was a month ago. See our latest analysis for McDonald's. McDonald’s has seen its share price slip nearly 6% over the past month, which extends what has become a lukewarm 2024. Its price return year-to-date has barely budged, and its total shareholder return for the past year is just under...
